issue.title: [Gandiva][C++] Adding mask-show-first-n and mask-show-last-n functions
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-17070](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-17070). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Adding functions to Gandiva:
mask_show_first_n(string, int)
mask_show_last_n(string, int)

'Masking' according to Hive specification
(a-z : x, A-Z : X, 0-9 : n)
